thread.title: Netanyahu says will use 'all means' to end Palestinian violence - Region - World
thread.title_full: Netanyahu says will use 'all means' to end Palestinian violence - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Netanyahu says will use 'all means' to end Palestinian violence - Region - World
text:
Related Arab League calls for Int'l protection of Palestinians PHOTO GALLERY: Palestinian protesters clash with Israeli forces Palestinian beaten by Settlers over stabbing allegations, taken to hospital Israel 'wants third intifida': Palestinian foreign minister Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Tuesday that Israel would use "all means" available to end Palestinian violence and that new security measures were planned.
Speaking before parliament, he also warned Palestinian president Mahmoud Abbas that he would hold him responsible if incitement led to a further deterioration after nearly two weeks of violence, including a wave of stabbing attacks.
